variables.name: mCleanupAfterExit
variables.comment: Runnable used to clean up listeners after exit transition.

methods.name: public void requestEnterTransition(Transition transition)
methods.comment: * Requests that an enter transition run after the next layout pass.

methods.name: private void startEnterTransition(Transition enterTransition)
methods.comment: * Starts the pending enter transition, if one is set.

methods.name: public void startExitTransition(@NonNull Transition transition, @Nullable final View anchorRoot, @Nullable final Rect epicenter, @NonNull final TransitionListener listener)
methods.comment:
* Starts an exit transition immediately. *

* Note: The transition listener is guaranteed to have * its {@code onTransitionEnd} method called even if the transition * never starts.

methods.name: public void cancelTransitions()
methods.comment: * Cancels all pending or current transitions.

methodNames: public void startExitTransition(@NonNull Transition transition, @Nullable final View anchorRoot, @Nullable final Rect epicenter, @NonNull final TransitionListener listener)
